title: Attack on Titan
synopsis: In a world where humanity lives inside walled cities to escape giant Titans, Eren Yeager joins the fight to reclaim freedom.

title: Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba
synopsis: Tanjiro Kamado becomes a demon slayer to save his sister Nezuko, who was turned into a demon, and avenge his family.

title: Naruto
synopsis: Naruto Uzumaki, a young ninja with a sealed demon, dreams of becoming Hokage to earn his village’s respect.

title: Death Note
synopsis: Light Yagami finds a supernatural notebook that kills anyone whose name is written in it, sparking a battle of wits with detective L.

title: My Teen Romantic Comedy Yahari
synopsis: Hachiman Hikigaya, a cynical high schooler, is forced to join a service club, leading to unexpected friendships and personal growth.

title: Fullmetal Alchemist: Brotherhood
synopsis: Brothers Edward and Alphonse Elric use alchemy to search for the Philosopher’s Stone, facing moral dilemmas and dark conspiracies.

title: One Punch Man
synopsis: Saitama, a hero who can defeat any opponent with one punch, struggles to find meaning in his overwhelmingly powerful life.

title: Re:Zero - Starting Life in Another World
synopsis: Subaru Natsuki is transported to a fantasy world where he discovers he can rewind time by dying, using it to protect those he loves.

title: Cowboy Bebop
synopsis: Bounty hunter Spike Spiegel and his crew travel the galaxy in the spaceship Bebop, confronting their pasts and new challenges.

title: Jujutsu Kaisen
synopsis: Yuji Itadori becomes a sorcerer after swallowing a cursed object, fighting malevolent curses to protect humanity.
